situation.title: Cross-border workers, business trips to the CZ
situation.meta_description: It is possible to travel to the Czech Republic only in strictly necessary cases. Trips to work or to do business (including commuters) are a part of this category.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

It is possible to travel to the Czech Republic only in strictly necessary cases, such as work- or business-related trips.

Several rules and exceptions apply to foreigners entering the territory of the Czech Republic, which are described on its website by the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic.

In case of doubts or questions, please call the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic: +420 974 820 680 - option 3 (Mon - Thu: 8:00 - 16:00 and Fri: 8:00 - 12:00). Or by e-mail: cestovani.covid19@mvcr.cz. Information is available in Czech and English language.
